title: All-Electric Cadillac LYRIQ | ScissorHandsFree | Full Version
author: Cadillac
description:
Timothée Chalamet stars as Edgar, the son of Edward Scissorhands, and Winona Ryder reprises her role as Kim Boggs. Watch as the all-electric Cadillac LYRIQ helps Edgar take the wheel with a high-tech helping hand. 

Explore the all-electric Cadillac LYRIQ: https://www.cadillac.com/future-vehicles/lyriq

Be among the first to receive LYRIQ updates: https://www.cadillac.com/future-vehicles/lyriq/request-information

Join the conversation on our social channels:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cadillac
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cadillac
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/cadillac

localize.description:
蒂莫西-查拉梅特出演剪刀手爱德华的儿子埃德加，薇诺娜-瑞德重现金-博格斯的角色。看全电动凯迪拉克LYRIQ在高科技的帮助下，帮助Edgar掌握方向盘。

探索全电动凯迪拉克LYRIQ：https://www.cadillac.com/future-vehicles/lyriq。

第一时间收到LYRIQ的更新：https://www.cadillac.com/future-vehicles/lyriq/request-information。

在我们的社交渠道上加入对话。
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cadillac
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cadillac
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/cadillac
localize.title: 全电动凯迪拉克LYRIQ | 剪刀手免费 | 完整版
